input_text:
Job Title: Senior Drainage Project Manager – High Profile Projects

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Senior Drainage Project Manager – Drive Your Career Forward with High Profile Projects and Flexible Schedule

We are seeking a Senior Drainage Project Manager to join our client’s dynamic team in Austin, TX. As a rapidly growing company, your contributions will be instrumental in shaping the future of water resources engineering in Central Texas and beyond. You’ll have the opportunity to work on a variety of high-profile projects and smaller-scale initiatives, positioning yourself at the forefront of innovation and growth in the field.

Benefits

– Engage in stimulating high-profile projects alongside smaller projects, allowing for a diverse and challenging work environment.

– Enjoy a hybrid work schedule with 2 days onsite and 3 days remote, providing flexibility and work-life balance.

– Join a company that is rapidly expanding, offering ample opportunities for professional development and career advancement.

Responsibilities

– Lead and mentor a team of engineers to ensure successful project outcomes and professional growth.

– Develop plans, specifications, and cost estimates for complex water resources projects.

– Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to drive project success and client satisfaction.

Requirements

– Hold a B.S. in Civil Engineering or related field, along with a PE license in Texas.

– Demonstrate at least 10 years of experience in modeling and drainage design or 8 years with an M.S.

– Showcase leadership proficiency in design engineering or project management roles.

Do you have any disability or condition that could affect you in the application and interview process? Please feel free to share this information as part of your application, including any necessary adjustments you might need, so we can help make the process easier for you. We assure you this information will not have any negative effect on the interview process outcome.

About NonStop: We are NonStop, a leading provider of staffing solutions throughout Europe and now also in the US. We’re passionate about connecting talent with opportunity and work non-stop to support our clients in hiring the best talent for their teams. Feel free to pop over to our website, NonStop Consulting (https://www.nonstopconsulting.com), for more information, to browse all our roles, or to let us know how we can help you.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
